Articles.Content:
Hello, i'm SolidJuho A.K.A (Also know as) SolidGaming Co-Owner.

I had played ksp since of 0.18.4 KSP versio, but i was too lazy to join forums, but now i am finally here.

I think best fly so on i had be launch rocket to Eve, but i little bit landed too hard and i got stuck there (i think versio was 0.20) but after 0.25 i haven't maked big missions in KSP, I just like make airplanes, my newest think was flying surfboard, i got idea from Scott Manley.

But after that surfboard i had started making mod, P.A.I - Paper airplane Industrial, i try make first official release at sunday, there will be parts wich are maded from Paper/cardboard and wood

My native language is not english (it is Finnish :3) so, i am sorry my mistakes.
Welcome aboard! The Forums are a real hodgepodge of different nationalities. I'm sure you'll like it here

Greetings.

That paper airplane mod sounds like it could be a lot of fun!
Ty, Ether. And it's going to be fun.
